messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/11/03 5:45:09 AM, KathrynJB@... writes:

<< Funny thing...when I was first considering homeschooling I went to the
library for books about it, and ran first into <A
HREF="http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0963974033/qid=1060602068/sr=1-12/ref=sr_1_12/002-398
4413-1804037?v=glance&s=books">Onto the Yellow School Bus and
Through the Gates of Hel</A>l. Oh my....I realized that we might be very
lonely.... At
the time, I didn't realize that SHE was the mellow one! >>

OH!
She's not the one who used to like me.
I was thinking of Mary PRIDE.

(Never mind.)

I have fan mail from her somewhere.

Sandra

messages.subject: Nat'l Homeschool Conf. in FL
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, I didn t see YOUR name here---what ARE they thinking??? But we COULD all go crash it---I have an extra demin jumper or two!  ~kelly Home School
messages.messageBody:
Sandra, I didn't see YOUR name here---what ARE they thinking???

But we COULD all go crash it---I have an extra demin jumper or two! <G>

~kelly

Home School Conference



Mark your calendars for Labor Day Weekend!



After more than a year of planning, the National Christian
Homeschool Conference (NCHC) will take place on August 28-30, 2003. This
Christ-centered event will be held at the beautiful Orlando World Center Marriott Resort
and Convention Center. A combination family retreat and homeschool
enrichment conference, the NCHC will feature lectures, workshops and a wonderful
exhibit hall.

Many well-known homeschool experts have collaborated to make this
new event a reality, including Dave Exley, producer of the Florida Homeschool
Convention (FHC) from 1991-2000, and Rev. Ron Heffield, registrations manager
for the FHC from 1994-2000.



Registration Information:

<A HREF="http://www.christianhomeschoolconference.com/">www.christianhomeschoolconference.com</A>



Contains all details on Workshops and Hotel Information. (Hotel rate will be
$105 per night.)

Make it a family vacation in sunny Orlando!



Confirmed Presenters:



William Anderson William Anderson Books

Bruce & Valerie Bendt Bendt Family Ministries

Chris Davis The Elijah Company

Bob Farewell Lifetime Books and Gifts

Catie Frates Censored Science

Felice Gerwitz Media Angels

Mary Hood The Relaxed Homeschooler

Sharon Jeffus Visual Manna

Chris Klicka National Center for Home
Education

David Quine Cornerstone Curriculum

Guy Rodgers The Principle Approach
International FACE

Rob Shearer Greenleaf Press

Monte and Karey Swan Singing Springs Productions

Von Trapp Children Singing Group

Wayne Tully National Driver Training

Richard “Little Bear” Wheeler Mantle Ministries

Pat Wesolowski DP&K Productions

Theo Williams The MIMEistry Company

Cynthia Wiggers Geography Matters

Jay Wile Apologia Educational
Ministries





Exhibitors include the above plus many others. Check out ALL the information
at <A HREF="http://www.christianhomeschoolconference.com/">www.christianhomeschoolconference.com</A>.
